text:
SCOTTSDALE, Ariz.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
Voya Prime Rate Trust (NYSE: PPR)
TO: Interested Parties DATE: April 30, 2018 The following dividend information is for the 30 Days of April for Voya Prime Rate Trust (CUSIP No. 92913A 10 0):

Declaration Date: 4/30/2018
Ex. Date: 5/9/18
Record Date: 5/10/18
Payable Date: 5/22/18
Voya Investment Management Co. LLC
Dan Norman
7337 E. Doubletree Ranch Road

Scottsdale, AZ 85258
